## OmvDataSourceParameters.filterDescr property

A description for the feature filter that can be safely passed down to the web workers. It has to be generated with the help of the \[\[OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder\]\] (to guarantee correctness). This parameter gets applied to the decoder used in the \[\[OmvDataSource\]\] which might be shared between various \[\[OmvDataSource\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
filterDescr?: OmvFeatureFilterDescription;
```
